channel.title: Need Emote tab help!
channel.description:
When i click the emote tab, it has all the emotes there, but you can't go to the bottom because there is no scroll of anything. How are we supposed to get access the skill capes emotes?
Is there a special code to put for a scroll to get to the bottom?
